author: kpedro88
body:
This PR updates almost all 14 TeV relval workflows for Phase2 to Pythia8 fragments, and adds a few that were requested.

There were two rather obscure ones with no pythia8 examples in Configuration/Generator, so I left them as pythia6:
LM1_sfts_14TeV_cfi
H200ChargedTaus_Tauola_14TeV_cfi

@bendavid @calabria I absorbed #16497 and #16522 into this more general PR (to avoid conflicts), so you can close those ones.
title: Update 14 TeV relval workflows to Pythia8
